title: Kan Chatuan Pa lenna runah
lyrics:
Kan chatuan Pa lenna runah,
Van mipui te inkhawmin;
He thu ropui an zawt vel a,
Khawpui chhung hmun tin a mi.
"Tunge lehkhabu hi hawng a,
A chhinchhiah te phelh tlak awm le?"
Tiin an han zawt vel chiam a,
Tuma'n an chhang thei lo ve.

Van mipui chhiarsen loh zingah,
Pakhat tal in awm lo'm ni?
Ngaiteh, Davida kulhpui khan,
A hnehta, ropui takin.
An lawm hla thawm thangkhawk riin,
Van khawpui a nghawr nghing ta a;
Van angel ten thla an khawng ri,
Khawpui chhung an hual vel a.

Pathian thuruk eng ropui chu,
A puakdarh lei thim zingah;
Bethlehem tlang a rawn en a,
A zau zel hnam tin zingah.
Ngaiteh, van mi chhiarsen loh te,
An thawm ri chu a va mawi em;
Chungnungberah ropui rawh se,
Lei chungah rem leng rawh se.

I lawm ang u, Van Lal ropui,
Lal Imanuela chu;
Khawvel a hmangaih avangin,
Lei sual thimah vakvaiin.
Khawvel tan a nun a pe ta,
Tunah vanah ro a rel ta;
Khitah kan inkhawm hunin,
A hmel ropui kan hmu ang.
